Terms and Conditions - PeachPapaya

Effective Date: August 1, 2025

1. Services

PeachPapaya provides professional driving instruction services including:

  • Behind-the-wheel driving lessons
  • Road test preparation
  • Defensive driving instruction
  • Highway driving practice
  • Parallel parking instruction

2. Booking and Cancellation

Important:

  • 24-hour notice required for lesson cancellations
  • Late cancellations may incur a 50% charge
  • No-shows will be charged the full lesson fee

3. Payment Terms

Payment is required at the time of booking. We accept:

  • Credit/Debit cards
  • Digital payments
  • Cash (exact change only)

4. Student Requirements

Students must:

  • Be at least 16 years old (or meet state requirements)
  • Have a valid learner's permit
  • Wear appropriate footwear
  • Arrive on time for scheduled lessons
  • Follow all safety instructions

5. Safety and Liability

PeachPapaya maintains comprehensive insurance coverage. However, students are responsible for following all safety instructions and traffic laws during lessons.

6. Weather and Road Conditions

Lessons may be rescheduled due to severe weather conditions or unsafe road conditions. We prioritize safety above all else.

7. Instructor Qualifications

All PeachPapaya instructors are:

  • State-certified driving instructors
  • Background checked
  • Experienced in defensive driving
  • Patient and professional

8. Vehicle Safety

Our training vehicles are regularly maintained and equipped with:

  • Dual controls for instructor safety
  • Regular safety inspections
  • Clean and well-maintained interiors

9. Refund Policy

Refunds are available for unused lessons with 48-hour notice. Processing may take 5-7 business days.

10. Contact

Email: sreerag@welovedinspace.studio

For questions about these terms: Contact us via email

Development version - Updated terms will be published before production launch.
